```{=html}
<script>
/* ---- Publications Enhancer (group by year, bold your name + journal, add badges) ---- */
(function () {
  function normalize(s){ return (s||"").toLowerCase(); }

  // 1) Detect YOUR NAME (full name preferred)
  const YOUR_FULL = [
    "alexander buritica",
    "alexander buriticá",
    "buritica, alexander",
    "buriticá, alexander",
    "buritica casanova, alexander",
    "buritica-casanova, alexander"
  ];

  // Keep last name as fallback too
  const YOUR_LAST = ["buritica", "buriticá", "buritica-casanova", "buritica casanova"];

  // 2) Journal badge labels
  const journalMap = [
    { key: "Agricultural Systems", badge: "Agricultural Systems" },
    { key: "Scientific Reports", badge: "Scientific Reports" },
    { key: "Food Policy", badge: "Food Policy" },
    { key: "Applied Geography", badge: "Applied Geography" },
    { key: "Environmental and Resource Economics", badge: "Env & Resource Econ" },
    { key: "Conservation Science and Practice", badge: "Conservation Sci & Practice" },
    { key: "Ambiente y Sostenibilidad", badge: "Ambiente y Sostenibilidad" }
  ];

  const refs = document.querySelector("#refs");
  if (!refs) return;

  const entries = Array.from(refs.querySelectorAll(".csl-entry"));
  if (!entries.length) return;

  // Helper: extract year (first 19xx/20xx)
  function getYear(el){
    const t = el.textContent || "";
    const m = t.match(/\b(19|20)\d{2}\b/);
    return m ? m[0] : "Other";
  }

  // Helper: find journal element (usually <em> or <i> in CSL)
  function getJournalEl(el){
    return el.querySelector("i, em");
  }

  // Helper: find DOI link
  function getDoiUrl(el){
    const links = Array.from(el.querySelectorAll("a"));
    const doi = links.find(a => /doi\.org\//i.test(a.href));
    return doi ? doi.href : null;
  }

  // Build grouped container
  const container = document.createElement("div");
  container.className = "pubs-container";

  // Group by year
  const groups = {};
  entries.forEach(e => {
    const y = getYear(e);
    (groups[y] ||= []).push(e);
  });

  const years = Object.keys(groups)
    .filter(y => y !== "Other")
    .sort((a,b) => parseInt(b)-parseInt(a));
  if (groups["Other"]) years.push("Other");

  years.forEach(y => {
    const sec = document.createElement("section");
    sec.className = "pub-year-section";

    const h = document.createElement("h3");
    h.className = "pub-year";
    h.textContent = y === "Other" ? "Other" : y;
    sec.appendChild(h);

    const list = document.createElement("div");
    list.className = "pub-list";

    groups[y].forEach(e => {
      // Wrap each entry in a card
      const card = document.createElement("div");
      card.className = "pub-card";

      // Badges row
      const badges = document.createElement("div");
      badges.className = "pub-badges";

      // Year badge
      const yearBadge = document.createElement("span");
      yearBadge.className = "pub-badge pub-badge-year";
      yearBadge.textContent = y;
      badges.appendChild(yearBadge);

      // Journal badge (from journal element)
      const jEl = getJournalEl(e);
      const jText = (jEl && jEl.textContent) ? jEl.textContent.trim() : "";
      if (jText) {
        const jm = journalMap.find(x => normalize(jText).includes(normalize(x.key)));
        const jBadge = document.createElement("span");
        jBadge.className = "pub-badge pub-badge-journal";
        jBadge.textContent = jm ? jm.badge : jText;
        badges.appendChild(jBadge);

        // ALSO bold the journal name in the citation text
        jEl.innerHTML = "<strong>" + jEl.textContent + "</strong>";
      }

      // DOI badge
      const doiUrl = getDoiUrl(e);
      if (doiUrl) {
        const doiBadge = document.createElement("a");
        doiBadge.className = "pub-badge pub-badge-doi";
        doiBadge.href = doiUrl;
        doiBadge.target = "_blank";
        doiBadge.rel = "noopener";
        doiBadge.textContent = "DOI";
        badges.appendChild(doiBadge);
      }

      // Bold YOUR FULL NAME first (best-effort)
      let html = e.innerHTML;

      // bold full name patterns
      YOUR_FULL.forEach(k => {
        const re = new RegExp(`\\b(${k})\\b`, "gi");
        html = html.replace(re, "<strong>$1</strong>");
      });

      // fallback: bold last name occurrences
      YOUR_LAST.forEach(k => {
        const re = new RegExp(`\\b(${k})\\b`, "gi");
        html = html.replace(re, "<strong>$1</strong>");
      });

      e.innerHTML = html;

      // Move into card
      card.appendChild(badges);
      card.appendChild(e);
      list.appendChild(card);
    });

    sec.appendChild(list);
    container.appendChild(sec);
  });

  // Replace refs content
  refs.innerHTML = "";
  refs.appendChild(container);
})();
</script>
```
